item.title: Part2 Azure DevOps Agents With Container Apps in Bicep
Part 1: Azure DevOps agents with Container apps in bicep
item.description: Requirements In the guide I will use Azure CLI to deploy the bicep templates. A DevOps environment Visual code + Bicep extension will make your life easier. Introduction This is the first part of a series of 2. The first part set-up a Azure DevOps agent within an Azure container registry. In the second part I will use this container to set-up Azure container apps. if you already have a DevOps container ready you can skip this and head straight on to Part 2: Azure DevOps agents with Container apps in bicep
